00111 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_HELP "F1"
00112 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_SELECTALL "Ctrl+A"
00113 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_BOLD "Ctrl+B"
00114 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_COPY "Ctrl+C"
00115 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_FIND "Ctrl+F"
00116 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_ICON "Ctrl+I"
00117 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_JOIN "Ctrl+J"
00118 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_COLOR "Ctrl+K"
00119 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_CONTEXT "Ctrl+N"
00120 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_RESET "Ctrl+O"
00121 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_PLAINTEXT "Ctrl+P"
00122 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_REVERSE "Ctrl+R"
00123 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_SERVERS "Ctrl+S"
00124 //Ctrl+U:[/b] Insert Underline control character
00125 //Ctrl+V:[/b] Paste clipboard contents
00126 //Ctrl+W:[/b] Close current window
00127 //Ctrl+X:[/b] Cut to clipboard
00128 //Ctrl+Y:[/b] Redo last action
00129 //Ctrl+Z:[/b] Undo last action
00130 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_AWAY "Ctrl+Shift+A"
00131 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_EDITOR_TOOLBAR "Ctrl+Shift+B"
00132 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_CONNECT "Ctrl+Shift+C"
00133 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_EDITOR_EVENT "Ctrl+Shift+E"
00134 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_IDENTITY "Ctrl+Shift+I"
00135 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_EDITOR_ALIAS "Ctrl+Shift+L"
00136 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_OPTIONS "Ctrl+Shift+O"
00137 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_EDITOR_POPUP "Ctrl+Shift+P"
00138 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_EDITOR_ACTION "Ctrl+Shift+Q"
00139 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_EDITOR_RAW "Ctrl+Shift+R"
00140 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_EDITOR_TESTER "Ctrl+Shift+S"
00141 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_THEME "Ctrl+Shift+T"
00142 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_USERS "Ctrl+Shift+U"
00143 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_EXEC "Ctrl+Shift+X"
00144 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_WIN_PREV Qt::ALT + Qt::Key_Up
00145 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_WIN_NEXT Qt::ALT + Qt::Key_Down
00146 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_CONTEXT_WIN_PREV Qt::ALT + Qt::SHIFT + Qt::Key_Up
00147 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_CONTEXT_WIN_NEXT Qt::ALT + Qt::SHIFT + Qt::Key_Down
00148 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_HIGHLIGHT_WIN_PREV Qt::ALT + Qt::Key_PageUp
00149 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_HIGHLIGHT_WIN_NEXT Qt::ALT + Qt::Key_PageDown
00150 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_WIN_MAXIMIZE Qt::CTRL + Qt::Key_Up
00151 #define KVI_SHORTCUTS_WIN_MINIMIZE Qt::CTRL + Qt::Key_Down
00152 //      Shift+<F1-F12>:[/b] window switch[br]
00153 //      PageUp:[/b] Scroll the output window up one page[br]
00154 //      PageDown:[/b] Scroll the output window down one page[br]
00155 //      Shift+PageUp:[/b] Scroll the output window up one line[br]
00156 //      Shift+PageDown:[/b] Scroll the output window down one line[br]
00157 //      Ctrl+LeftArrow:[/b] Selection left to the previous word[br]
00158 //      Ctrl+RightArrow:[/b] Selection right to the next word[br]
00159 //      Ctrl+Shift+LeftArrow:[/b] Previous word[br]
00160 //      Ctrl+Shift+RightArrow:[/b] Next word[br]
00161 //      Ctrl+<digit>:[/b] Script accelerators (see OnAccelKeyPressed)[br]
00162 //      F2-F12, Shift+(F1-F12):[/b] Script accelerators (see OnAccelKeyPressed)[br]
00163 //      CursorUp:[/b] Move backward in the command history[br]
00164 //      CursorDown:[/b] Move forward in the command history[br]
00165 //      Ctrl+PageUp:[/b] Open the history popup[br]
00166 //      CursorRight:[/b] Move the cursor to the right[br]
00167 //      CursorLeft:[/b] Move the cursor to the left :)[br]
00168 //      Shift+CursorLeft:[/b] Move the selection to the left[br]
00169 //      Shift+RightCursor:[/b] Move the selection to the right[br]
00170 //      Alt+Enter:[/b] Show/hide the multiline editor[br]
00171 //      Ctrl+Enter:[/b] Send message as plain text, ignoring / commands[br]
00172 //      Alt+<numeric_sequence>:[/b] Insert the character by ASCII/Unicode code[br]
00173 //              [example]
00174 //              Alt+32:[/b] Inserts ASCII/Unicode character 32: ' ' (a space)
00175 //              Alt+00032:[/b] Same as above :)
00176 //              Alt+13:[/b] Inserts the Carriage Return (CR) control character
00177 //              Alt+77:[/b] Inserts ASCII/Unicode character 77: 'M'
00178 //              Alt+23566:[/b] Inserts Unicode character 23566 (an ideogram)
00179 //              [/example]
00180 //      Tab in the first word of input:[/b] Complete nicknames in the current channel or query[br]
00181 //      Tab after a leading /:[/b] Complete commands[br]
00182 //      Tab after a / in the middle of input:[/b] Complete directories[br]
00183 //      Tab after a $:[/b] Complete function names[br]
00184 //      Shift+Tab after the first word of input:[/b] Complete nicknames with full mask in the current channel or query
00185 
00186 /*
00187         @doc: keyboard
00188         @type:
00189                 generic
00190         @title:
00191                 Keyboard shortcuts
00192         @keyterms:
00193                 Keyboard shortcuts
00194         @short:
00195                 The list of the common keyboard shortcuts
00196         @body:
00197                 [big]All the standard keys alphabetically ordered[/big][br]
00198                 [b]F1:[/b] Help Index (Window)[br]
00199                 [b]Ctrl+A:[/b] Select all[br]
00200                 [b]Ctrl+B:[/b] Insert Bold control character[br]
00201                 [b]Ctrl+C:[/b] Copy to clipboard[br]
00202                 [b]Ctrl+F:[/b] Open "Find Text" dialog[br]
00203                 [b]Ctrl+I:[/b] Open "Insert icon" dialog[br]
00204                 [b]Ctrl+J:[/b] Open "Join Channels" dialog[br]
00205                 [b]Ctrl+K:[/b] Open "Insert Color" dialog[br]
00206                 [b]Ctrl+N:[/b] Open new context[br]
00207                 [b]Ctrl+O:[/b] Insert Reset control character[br]
00208                 [b]Ctrl+P:[/b] Insert "Plain text" control character[br]
00209                 [b]Ctrl+R:[/b] Insert Reverse control character[br]
00210                 [b]Ctrl+S:[/b] Open "Servers" dialog [br]
00211                 [b]Ctrl+U:[/b] Insert Underline control character[br]
00212                 [b]Ctrl+V:[/b] Paste clipboard contents[br]
00213                 [b]Ctrl+W:[/b] Close current window[br]
00214                 [b]Ctrl+X:[/b] Cut to clipboard[br]
00215                 [b]Ctrl+Y:[/b] Redo last action[br]
00216                 [b]Ctrl+Z:[/b] Undo last action[br]
00217                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+A:[/b] Go away/back[br]
00218                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+B:[/b] Open "Manage Toolbars" dialog[br]
00219                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+C:[/b] Connect/disconnect current irc context[br]
00220                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+E:[/b] Open Event editor[br]
00221                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+I:[/b] Open Identity options[br]
00222                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+L:[/b] Open Alias editor[br]
00223                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+O:[/b] Open "Options" dialog[br]
00224                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+P:[/b] Open Popup editor[br]
00225                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+Q:[/b] Open Action editor[br]
00226                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+R:[/b] Open Raw events editor[br]
00227                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+S:[/b] Open Script tester[br]
00228                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+T:[/b] Open "Theme Options" dialog[br]
00229                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+U:[/b] Open "Registered users" dialog[br]
00230                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+X:[/b] Open "Execute Script" dialog[br]
00231 
00232                 [big]Window handling related keys:[/big][br]
00233                 [b]Alt+UpArrow:[/b] Previous window[br]
00234                 [b]Alt+DownArrow:[/b] Next window[br]
00235                 [b]Alt+Shift+UpArrow:[/b] Previous window in the same IRC context[br]
00236                 [b]Alt+Shift+DownArrow:[/b] Next window in the same IRC context[br]
00237                 [b]Alt+PageUp:[/b] Previous highlighted window[br]
00238                 [b]Alt+PageDown:[/b] Next highlighted window[br]
00239                 [b]Ctrl+UpArrow:[/b] Maximizes current window[br]
00240                 [b]Ctrl+DownArrow:[/b] Minimizes current window[br]
00241                 [b]Shift+<F1-F12>:[/b] window switch[br]
00242                 [b]PageUp:[/b] Scroll the output window up one page[br]
00243                 [b]PageDown:[/b] Scroll the output window down one page[br]
00244                 [b]Shift+PageUp:[/b] Scroll the output window up one line[br]
00245                 [b]Shift+PageDown:[/b] Scroll the output window down one line[br]
00246                 [b]Ctrl+W:[/b] Close current window[br]
00247 
00248                 [big]Text editing related hotkeys:[/big][br]
00249                 [b]Ctrl+LeftArrow:[/b] Selection left to the previous word[br]
00250                 [b]Ctrl+RightArrow:[/b] Selection right to the next word[br]
00251                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+LeftArrow:[/b] Previous word[br]
00252                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+RightArrow:[/b] Next word[br]
00253                 [b]Ctrl+<digit>:[/b] Script accelerators (see OnAccelKeyPressed)[br]
00254                 [b]F2-F12, Shift+(F1-F12):[/b] Script accelerators (see OnAccelKeyPressed)[br]
00255                 [b]Ctrl+B:[/b] nsert the 'bold' mIRC text control character[br]
00256                 [b]Ctrl+K:[/b] Insert the 'color' mIRC text control character[br]
00257                 [b]Ctrl+R:[/b] Insert the 'reverse' mIRC text control character[br]
00258                 [b]Ctrl+U:[/b] Insert the 'underline' mIRC text control character[br]
00259                 [b]Ctrl+O:[/b] Insert the 'reset' mIRC text control character[br]
00260                 [b]Ctrl+P:[/b] Insert the 'non-crypt' (plain text) KVIrc control character used to disable[br] encryption of the current text line[br]
00261                 [b]Ctrl+C:[/b] Copy the selected text to clipboard[br]
00262                 [b]Ctrl+X:[/b] Cut the selected text[br]
00263                 [b]Ctrl+V:[/b] Paste the clipboard contents (same as middle mouse click)[br]
00264                 [b]Ctrl+I:[/b] Insert the 'icon' control code and pops up the icon list box[br]
00265                 [b]CursorUp:[/b] Move backward in the command history[br]
00266                 [b]CursorDown:[/b] Move forward in the command history[br]
00267                 [b]Ctrl+PageUp:[/b] Open the history popup[br]
00268                 [b]CursorRight:[/b] Move the cursor to the right[br]
00269                 [b]CursorLeft:[/b] Move the cursor to the left :)[br]
00270                 [b]Shift+CursorLeft:[/b] Move the selection to the left[br]
00271                 [b]Shift+RightCursor:[/b] Move the selection to the right[br]
00272                 [b]Alt+Enter:[/b] Show/hide the multiline editor[br]
00273                 [b]Ctrl+Enter:[/b] Send message as plain text, ignoring / commands[br]
00274                 [b]Alt+<numeric_sequence>:[/b] Insert the character by ASCII/Unicode code[br]
00275                 [example]
00276                 [b]Alt+32:[/b] Inserts ASCII/Unicode character 32: ' ' (a space)
00277                 [b]Alt+00032:[/b] Same as above :)
00278                 [b]Alt+13:[/b] Inserts the Carriage Return (CR) control character
00279                 [b]Alt+77:[/b] Inserts ASCII/Unicode character 77: 'M'
00280                 [b]Alt+23566:[/b] Inserts Unicode character 23566 (an ideogram)
00281                 [/example]
00282 
00283                 [big]Completion hotkeys[/big][br]
00284                 [b]Tab in the first word of input:[/b] Complete nicknames in the current channel or query[br]
00285                 [b]Tab after a leading /:[/b] Complete commands[br]
00286                 [b]Tab after a / in the middle of input:[/b] Complete directories[br]
00287                 [b]Tab after a $:[/b] Complete function names[br]
00288                 [b]Shift+Tab after the first word of input:[/b] Complete nicknames with full mask in the current channel or query
00289 */
